name: You Are A Frog.
description:
You are a frog.

WASD to move, ENTER to continue dialogue.

Features 2am existentialism projected onto a frog.

Small test Bitsy game to learn how to use the toolset (verdict: I quite like it!), originally had bigger plans involving reincarnation and a small plotline involving a fly in the same universe but everything in the game took me too long to implement as is, so for self care reasons I scoped it down. I haven't done creative writing for years as I didn't choose English Language A-level, I do miss it but my word choice and sentence structure needs a lot of work again. Thanks for checking this out!

Forgive my UK spellings
